Indications

A phenylalanine free protein substitute for use in the dietary management of Phenylketonuria in people aged 3 years and older.

Product Features

  • Phenylalanine free
  • Low volume and ready to drink
  • Contains the necessary mixture of amino acids, carbohydrates, minerals, trace elements and vitamins to meet the daily nutritional needs of this age group
  • Provides 20g of protein equivalent per 174 ml pouch
  • Available in orange and purple flavors
  • Convenient, easy and great tasting

Nutritional Information & Ingredients

Available for download at the end of this page.

Caution

PKU cooler20 must only be given to patients with proven Phenylketonuria and under strict medical supervision.  It is not recommended for children under 3 years of age. PKU cooler20 is not for parenteral use.

Dosage and Administration

  • Dosage of PKU cooler20 should be determined by the clinician or dietitian
  • The daily protein requirement is given as PKU cooler20.
  • Additional protein is provided form exchanges of natural protein in medically prescribed quantities, to provide phenylalanine in controlled amounts, which is essential for normal growth and development.
  • Foods high in carbohydrate and fat but low in protein should be provided as an energy source to supply the remainder of daily calories.

Guidelines for Preparation and Use

PKU cooler20 comes in ready to drink sport pack.  Simply shake before serving, open the screw top and drink.  Product may be refrigerated for up to 24 hours after opening.  PKU cooler20 can also be placed in the freezer the night before serving and defrosted the following morning by leaving the drink pack at room temperature for 2 ½ hours.

Storage

Store unopened drink packs at room temperature.  The product can be chilled in the refrigerator the day before serving as it is delicious cold.  Avoid storing products in areas of extreme heat and direct sunlight.
